description:
The KDE Project released KDE Plasma 6.0.5 as the fifth and last maintenance update to the latest KDE Plasma 6 desktop environment series, fixing more bugs and adding various performance improvements.

The post KDE Plasma 6.0.5 Released as the Last Update in the Series with More Bug Fixes appeared first on Linux Today.
title: KDE Plasma 6.0.5 Released as the Last Update in the Series with More Bug Fixes

description:
The FFmpeg project gets €157K from Germany’s Sovereign Tech Fund, ensuring ongoing innovation. Here’s more on that!

The post Sovereign Tech Fund Backs FFmpeg Project with a €157K Infusion appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Sovereign Tech Fund Backs FFmpeg Project with a €157K Infusion

description:
Alpine Linux 3.20 released featuring GNOME 46, Plasma 6, Python 3.12, LLVM 18, Ruby 3.3, initial 64-bit RISC-V support, and more.

The post Alpine Linux 3.20 Debuts with Initial 64-Bit RISC-V Support appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Alpine Linux 3.20 Debuts with Initial 64-Bit RISC-V Support

description:
ALESCo takes the helm in AlmaLinux’s technical development, ensuring alignment with the community’s needs and tech trends.

The post AlmaLinux Launches Engineering Steering Committee appeared first on Linux Today.
title: AlmaLinux Launches Engineering Steering Committee
